attributes.action: Adopt the Inductrack Mag-Lev system for North - South rail transport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Inductrack Magnetically Levitated system uses permanent magnets for both levitation and (main) propulsion. No electrification of the track or vehicle is needed.  Thus it represents the greenest solution to rapid public transport.  Wasteful domestic short-haul flights with attendant problems of airport expansions, CO2 and noise would be eliminated.
